event.title: Share and Reuse Conference in Lisbon, Portugal

body.p:
Share and Reuse Conference 2017 organised under the umbrella of the ISAÂ² Programme by the ISA Unit of Directorate-General for Informatics (DIGIT) of the European Commission on 29 March in Lisbon, will bring together representatives from public administrations: policy and decision makers, legal professionals, IT managers, and procurers. Private sector IT developers providing IT solutions for public administration will also be represented.
You can also consult the respective event-wiki page.
